name: Croissants
steps: Roll butter between plastic (2 sticks) and refrigerate. Dissolved yeast, stir in 2/3 c. milk, 1/4 c. butter, the sugar, salt, eggs, 2 c. flour. Stir in flour til easy to handle. Knead til elastic and smooth. Place in a greased bowl. Cover, rise until double (1 hour) punch and refrigerate 1 hour.

Punch down roll in rectangle. Place butter center and fold over making sure sides are pinched in so butter won't come out. Roll out. Repeat twice butter in center each time. Cut in half-refrigerate 1 hour.

Do half at a time, roll out and shape into crescents. Points underneath. Place on cookie sheet. Refrigerate for 30 min. Heat oven to 425. Beat egg yolk and 1 Tbsp milk slightly. Brush croissants. Bake for 5 minutes, decrease oven to 400. Bake until brown and lightly crisp.
